author: Tim Marcin
title: Here are the 10 best tweets that got us through the week
description: Things aren't great right now, did you notice? But hey, you know what can still be good? Tweets ! The good-old micro-blogging posts you can only find online. That in mind, I scoured Twitter dot com — OK, so I kind of looked around and asked friends if they sa…
content:
Things aren't great right now, did you notice? 
But hey, you know what can still be good? Tweets! The good-old micro-blogging posts you can only find online.
